EmailTemplate.name: D&S Comms.LTS101 Technical Webcast September 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Aerospace LTS101 Technical Webcast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell Aerospace LTS101 Technical Update Webcast hosted by Customer & Product Support
You're invited to participate in the Honeywell Aerospace LTS101 technical webcast. The webcast will provide an overview of the LTS101 product line, technical updates on product improvement programs, updates of current service bulletins, and Q&A with Doug Kult, LTS/HTS Product Line Director and Jim Ebken, Product Support Engineer. Date: Tuesday, September 1, 2015
Time: 10:00 AM (Phoenix/MST) 17:00 PM (UTC/GMT)
TO REGISTER:
1. Please click here <https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/HYSNLLD> to provide us your full name, company name and email address.
2. Prior to the webcast, you will receive a confirmation email including the meeting conference phone numbers and online presentation login details.
We look forward to your attendance at the Honeywell Aerospace LTS101 Technical Update Webcast.
